text: Cripple Creek is a river in southern Herkimer County and northern Otsego County in the state of New York. It begins at the outlet of Weaver Lake near Warren and flows through Young Lake before flowing into Otsego Lake south of Springfield, New York. Was formally called Lawyers Creek. ==References== Category:Rivers of Otsego County, New York Category:Rivers of Herkimer County, New York Category:Rivers of New York (state)
title: Cripple Creek (New York)
